content:
IExpressionEvaluationFrame Interface

Definition

Defines the interface implemented by the workflow expression evaluation component that provides a context frame for expression evaluation.

In this Article

[ECMA2Yaml.Models.ECMAAttribute]
public interface IExpressionEvaluationFrame
Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

Note

This material discusses types and namespaces that are obsolete. For more information, see Deprecated Types in Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5.

Methods

CreateEvaluationFrame(IInstanceTable, DebugEngineCallback)

Creates a stack frame for workflow expression evaluation.

public void CreateEvaluationFrame (System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.IInstanceTable instanceTable, System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugEngineCallback callback);
Parameters
instanceTable
IInstanceTable

An object that implements IInstanceTable. Not used.

callback
DebugEngineCallback

The default DebugEngineCallback implemented by the workflow runtime.

Attributes
ObsoleteAttribute

Remarks

This method is invoked by the DebugController object.
